name: Summer on the Lake
description: Summer on the Lake by Jake Rutter (youtube: Devlog with Jake) made for  Brackeys 2022.2 Game Jam.  theme: "They're Not Alone" When you find yourself alone and without a weapon can you fend of an unknown foe and escape to safety? I will release a devlog of the making of this game with in the next week. You can check it out on youtube by searching: Devlog with Jake
